artworks.title: The Art Room
artworks.description: A painting of a corner of an art classroom, showing exposed brick, wood slats, canvas panels, and HVAC duct

artworks.title: Childhood Bedroom
artworks.description: A painting of a child's bedroom with yellow walls and a purple bed. Items in the room are a fan, crayons, a face drawn on the wall, and a single lamp

artworks.title: Two people in a room
artworks.description: A painting of a student sitting in a classroom facing a lecturer. The desk, board, and lines of the room extend to the edge of the canvas at a dramatic angle.
